recipesJson.description: This is a delicious lemon cake!"  if u love lemon cake,this is spot on delicious ðŸ˜‹ This sat overnight and it tastes just like taking a bite out of a moist piece of yummy lemon cake with light icing.  If you mix this you definately won't be disappointed!  The INW lemon cake is definately a star here and goes really well with the other flavors. Feedback is appreciated!

reviews.text: Well done!! My A.D.V is lemon meringue pie and this is a great cake GOOD JOB!
